title: Winter's Gift
description: This is an alternate cover edition for ASIN B00W3QA7VG.He's a steely tycoon. She's an elite call girl. Both have sworn off love...When Anton and Anna cross paths over the winter holidays, neither can deny how special their connection is. But it threatens the principle they've been living by for years: Don't trust anyone.Is this book for you? The La Boh√®me books are romantic comedies with an edge, a good deal of spice, and a lot of heart.In addition, each book is written as a no-cliffhanger standalone that follows a different couple. This means you can read them in any order you like. Hey, who says you can't have it all? Gentle reader, don't listen to naysayers! You absolutely can, because you're worth it.
author: Alix Nichols
